job_title: Programmer Analyst 4 or Datawarehouse Technical Architect
jd: From: hanshika, vyze hanshika@vyzeinc.com Reply to: hanshika@vyzeinc.com Job Description -Position: Programmer Analyst 4/ Datawarehouse Technical Architect Location: Richmond, VA (Only Local) Project Length: 6-12 m Required Skills and Qualifications:15+ years of experience in data warehousing and data architecture.Extensive experience in data mining, large scale data modeling, data profiling, and data mapping.Experience with Azure Cloud, Azure Data Factory, and Data Bricks.Experience with different database platforms and services like SOAP, REST, etc.Strong experience with Oracle, DataStage, and IBM Integration Bus (IIB) for data integration and ETL.Solid experience with data management and governance tools like IBM Information Governance Catalog (IGC), Information Knowledge Catalog (IKC), or Collibra.Expertise with modern cloud data warehouse platforms such as Azure Synapse or Snowflake.Experience in defining and implementing data governance frameworks and ensuring data quality management.Proven experience in designing and implementing scalable data warehouse solutions and strategies.Understanding of ETL processes, data integration strategies, and data migration in both on-premise and cloud environments.Familiarity with data modeling, data lakes, and big data technologies.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to balance competing priorities.Experience working in collaboration with Enterprise Architecture teams to create strategic roadmaps for data platforms.Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills, with the ability to work cross-functionally across teams. Preferred Qualifications:Knowledge of big data tools like Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka.Certifications in Oracle, Azure, or Snowflake technologies.Experience with data privacy regulations like GDPR, CCPA, and best practices in data securityExperience with Automation and AI in Data Warehousing Personal Attributes:Strong written and oral communication skills. Strong presentation and interpersonal skills and Ability to present ideas in user-friendly language. Required/Desired Skills Advanced skills in Data Warehousing, Data Analytics and Data ArchitectureRequired15Years Strong Background in data governance, data quality, data lineage and enterprise master data managementRequired15Years Experience working with Oracle PL/SQL and SQL Server Database Developement.Required15Years Written and oral communicationsRequired15Years Familiarity with data modeling, data lakes, and big data technologies.Required15Years Expertise with modern cloud data warehouse platforms such as Azure Synapse or Snowflake.Required12Years Strong Experience with other data integration tools and techniques including IBM DataStage, IBM IKC or CollibraRequired12Years Experience to use SnowflakeHighly desired10Years Experience with Automation and AI in Data WarehousingHighly desired10Years Knowledge of big data tools like Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka.Highly desired10Years
